data.text:
Haa, haa……I've completed the running portion! 
That's everything we planned to do today, right?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, haa……I've completed the running portion! 
󠁿That's everything we planned to do today, right?

data.text:
The long-awaited summer camp. Yaeno Muteki was really enthusiastic 
and today's training menu was finished in a flash.
data.processed:
󠁿The long-awaited summer camp. Yaeno Muteki was really enthusiastic 
󠁿and today's training menu was finished in a flash.

data.text: Then……I'm going to go play!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Then……I'm going to go play!

data.text:
Well, considering the way our time at the amusement park ended…… 
At this training camp, I'll be sure to forget about training!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Well, considering the way our time at the amusement park ended…… 
󠁿At this training camp, I'll be sure to forget about training!

data.text: And, there's something I'd like to confirm as well……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿And, there's something I'd like to confirm as well……

data.text:
……No, that was only said in passing! 
Once I'm sure, I'll speak with you again.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……No, that was only said in passing! 
󠁿Once I'm sure, I'll speak with you again.

data.text:
Well then, this unassuming Yaeno Muteki will go frolic 
amongst the waves. Now, towards a state of selflessness……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Well then, this unassuming Yaeno Muteki will go frolic 
󠁿amongst the waves. Now, towards a state of selflessness……!

data.text:
I have frolicked amongst the waves! Learning to walk while 
also avoiding the waves as they come in and out, this will 
help with race routeーー……No, this is training isn't it?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I have frolicked amongst the waves! Learning to walk while 
󠁿also avoiding the waves as they come in and out, this will 
󠁿help with race routeーー……No, this is training isn't it?

data.text:
I have enjoyed playing with a beach ball! 
Watching the form and explosive power of your 
opponents, it was a golden opportunity to learn……Ha!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I have enjoyed playing with a beach ball! 
󠁿Watching the form and explosive power of your 
󠁿opponents, it was a golden opportunity to learn……Ha!?

data.text: ……This is also training, isn't it?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿……This is also training, isn't it?

data.text:
Counter-intuitively……I tried running once again, but……! 
Wouldn't this……also be training!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Counter-intuitively……I tried running once again, but……! 
󠁿Wouldn't this……also be training!?

data.text:
……Kuu, then as many times as it takes! 
I'm going to the summer festival at night! 
If you're free, Trainer-dono, would you accompany me!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……Kuu, then as many times as it takes! 
󠁿I'm going to the summer festival at night! 
󠁿If you're free, Trainer-dono, would you accompany me!?

data.text:
……there's quite the sea of people here. 
Weaving through the crowd of people could be useful during a race……No!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……there's quite the sea of people here. 
󠁿Weaving through the crowd of people could be useful during a race……No!

data.text: Kuu, even here I'm still thinking about training……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Kuu, even here I'm still thinking about training……!

data.text:
I see, if it's target practice then it would have nothing 
to do with racing……most likely! Perhaps it will help 
me forget about training and reach a selfless state!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I see, if it's target practice then it would have nothing 
󠁿to do with racing……most likely! Perhaps it will help 
󠁿me forget about training and reach a selfless state!

data.text:
I appreciate it, Trainer-dono. 
Shopkeep-dono! I'd like to purchase one right of challenge!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I appreciate it, Trainer-dono. 
󠁿Shopkeep-dono! I'd like to purchase one right of challenge!

data.text: (Bang!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Bang!)

data.text: ……Muu.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿……Muu.

data.text: (Bang, bang!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Bang, bang!)

data.text:
How unfortunate~! You missed with all of them, huh!? 
Don't get disheartened and feel free to try again!
data.name: Shopkeeper
data.processed:
󠁿How unfortunate~! You missed with all of them, huh!? 
󠁿Don't get disheartened and feel free to try again!

data.text:
To think I'd miss with every shot…… 
I've shown you yet another unsightly display.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿To think I'd miss with every shot…… 
󠁿I've shown you yet another unsightly display.

data.text:
It was fine to fail, it was fine to just enjoy it. Whether it was 
playing or training, it was fine to be a little more laid-back.

choices.text: I know you've been doing your best.

data.processed:
󠁿It was fine to fail, it was fine to just enjoy it. Whether it was 
󠁿playing or training, it was fine to be a little more laid-back.

data.text:
……Fufu. As I thought, you would say something like that. 
At the amusement park, and even here……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……Fufu. As I thought, you would say something like that. 
󠁿At the amusement park, and even here……

data.text:
Thank you very much, I think I'm finally prepared. 
Trainer-dono, could I borrow a bit of your time?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Thank you very much, I think I'm finally prepared. 
󠁿Trainer-dono, could I borrow a bit of your time?

data.text:
I didn't mind, but I wonder what it could be. 
If I were to agree here without thinking carefully――
data.processed:
󠁿I didn't mind, but I wonder what it could be. 
󠁿If I were to agree here without thinking carefully――

data.text: Shopkeep-dono! I'd like another 5 rights of challenge please!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Shopkeep-dono! I'd like another 5 rights of challenge please!

data.text:
After that, the sound of toy gunfire 
echoed through the air for a while, but――
data.processed:
󠁿After that, the sound of toy gunfire 
󠁿echoed through the air for a while, but――

data.text:
Uguu, how unsightly! To not be able to hit anything even now! 
It's just laughable……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Uguu, how unsightly! To not be able to hit anything even now! 
󠁿It's just laughable……!

data.text:
Right, next time for sure! I've started to understand it 
just a bit. Like this, without putting in too much power……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Right, next time for sure! I've started to understand it 
󠁿just a bit. Like this, without putting in too much power……!

data.text:
Trainer-dono, how is it!? 
Are there any issues with my posture!?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-dono, how is it!? 
󠁿Are there any issues with my posture!?

data.text:
I appreciate it! While holding the gun, stay steady. 
Steady……have fun and……!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿I appreciate it! While holding the gun, stay steady. 
󠁿Steady……have fun and……!

data.text: Press forward!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Press forward!

data.text: (Bang!)
data.processed: 󠁿(Bang!)

data.text:
――With a soft sound, the stuffed cat doll that Yaeno 
Muteki had been aiming at this whole time fell.
data.processed:
󠁿――With a soft sound, the stuffed cat doll that Yaeno 
󠁿Muteki had been aiming at this whole time fell.

data.text:
Nice hit~! You nailed that prize! 
Congrats, missy!
data.name: Shopkeeper
data.processed:
󠁿Nice hit~! You nailed that prize! 
󠁿Congrats, missy!

data.text: Ah……! Thank you very much!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Ah……! Thank you very much!

data.text:
Trainer-dono, I did it! 
I've properly played this 'target practice'!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-dono, I did it! 
󠁿I've properly played this 'target practice'!

data.text:
On the way back from the festival……Yaeno Muteki said she had 
『Something to talk about』, so we ended up on the training camp beach.
data.processed:
󠁿On the way back from the festival……Yaeno Muteki said she had 
󠁿『Something to talk about』, so we ended up on the training camp beach.

data.text:
……Just now, I felt slightly like I had returned to my 
childhood. Using a toy gun to aim for that other toy……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……Just now, I felt slightly like I had returned to my 
󠁿childhood. Using a toy gun to aim for that other toy……

data.text: Yes, very much so!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Yes, very much so!

data.text:
……and thanks to that, I felt fulfilled. 
And somehow, I realized why I was so unable to forget about training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……and thanks to that, I felt fulfilled. 
󠁿And somehow, I realized why I was so unable to forget about training.

data.text:
Because this flame in my heart, outside of 
competition, was something I was ashamed of.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Because this flame in my heart, outside of 
󠁿competition, was something I was ashamed of.

data.text:
That carrying this fiery disposition during children's squabbles, 
was something unsightly and had to be avoided at all costs――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿That carrying this fiery disposition during children's squabbles, 
󠁿was something unsightly and had to be avoided at all costs――

data.text:
Believing that I had to maintain strict discipline, 
keeping things hidden, and always focusing on training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Believing that I had to maintain strict discipline, 
󠁿keeping things hidden, and always focusing on training.

data.text:
However, you told me it was fine if I was unsightly, 
it was fine if I failed. And that's probably why I…… 
was able to forget all about training and have fun.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿However, you told me it was fine if I was unsightly, 
󠁿it was fine if I failed. And that's probably why I…… 
󠁿was able to forget all about training and have fun.

data.text:
That this fire is not something to be afraid of. 
And nor……is it something to abhor.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿That this fire is not something to be afraid of. 
󠁿And nor……is it something to abhor.

data.text: Yes――When I'm with you……it's fine to forget about training.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿Yes――When I'm with you……it's fine to forget about training.

data.text:
Right, Trainer-dono. 
Right now……will you perform the 『Kata』 with me?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿Right, Trainer-dono. 
󠁿Right now……will you perform the 『Kata』 with me?

data.text:
……For some reason, I feel like it'll be 
completely different from any before.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
󠁿……For some reason, I feel like it'll be 
󠁿completely different from any before.

data.text:
The summer festival was almost over, and with fireworks going off 
in the distance, Yaeno Muteki began to perform the 『Kata』.
data.processed:
󠁿The summer festival was almost over, and with fireworks going off 
󠁿in the distance, Yaeno Muteki began to perform the 『Kata』.

data.text:
It had a different weight behind it compared to 
the 『Kata』 she had been training with so far. 
Almost as if the flames were dancing and playing――
data.processed:
󠁿It had a different weight behind it compared to 
󠁿the 『Kata』 she had been training with so far. 
󠁿Almost as if the flames were dancing and playing――

data.text: ……Aaaah――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿……Aaaah――

data.text: ――it was a fun break, wasn't it?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: 󠁿――it was a fun break, wasn't it?

data.text:
……It was a fun and refreshing performance, 
perfect for a summer evening.
data.processed:
󠁿……It was a fun and refreshing performance, 
󠁿perfect for a summer evening.
